```{r}
# placeholders

                            'hip_size', 'FT3', 'FT4', 'TSH', 'age')

```



```{r, results = 'asis'}
# for loop for categorical parameters

   var_int_lab<- vec_var_int_categorical_lab[j]

  rm(var_int, var_int_lab)  
 }

```
